Drawstring closure
Zippered side pockets to conveniently store your valuables
Elastic waistband with internal drawcord for an adjustable fit
Moisture-wicking, non see-through, breathable and lightweight fabric provides complete coverage
Wide open leg at bottom with the perfect length, makes you look slimmer, also can be worn easily over your gym leggings
Perfect for running, taking walks, gym workout, outdoor, hiking, fitness, jogging, sports training, warm-up or worn over your gym leggings

Baleaf Track Pants with Zipper Pockets design for outdoors and casual

Is this track pant light weight or heavy?

It’s lightweight since the material is lightweight and quick dry, it feels very comfortable.

Does this a sweat pants for exercise or running？

Yes, this is a great warm up pants for workout, exercise, running, sports or style, daily causal.

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 29,2022 03:54:50 UTC – Details)


Wangdo Men’s Zipper Pockets Joggers Pants – Casual Gym Workout Track Pants Comfortable Slim Fit Tapered Sweatpants
======= Size Chart ======
US S  :  Waist 29.5″-29.9″ —- Length 40.6″-41.3″
US M  :  Waist 30.3″-30.7″ —- Length 41.3″-42.1″
US L   :  Waist 31.1″-31.5″ —- Length 42.1″-42.9″
US XL  :  Waist 31.9″-32.3″ —- Length 42.9″-43.7″
US XXL :  Waist 32.7″-33.1″ —- Length 43.7″-44.5″
Note : If you want to be looser, choose a size larger than usual!
======= Design =========
Stretch Fit: Premium comfortable elastic material to ensure the maximum breathable and flexibility for your moving.
Elastic Waist: Elastic waistband with adjustable internal drawstring for comfortable fit and keep you jogging sweatpants from sliding down.
Tapered leg: Tapered leg design with elastic cuff to better show your body shape. 
Arc Fit: Arc fit insures the garment id tight in the right places to compliment any physique.
======= Suitable For =====
gym, leisure, home, outdoor, sports like running, workout, fitness, training, jogging, basketball, fishing, baseball, hiking, bodybuilding, dancing etc.
 
Return Policy: We know your concerns! Wangdo provides you worry-free return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your joggers, either size or color, please feel free to contact us. We will try our best to provide you happy purchasing experience by exchanging or refund easily.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.48 x 10.55 x 1.57 inches; 11.36 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 1, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09TNBWT27

Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
【COMFORTABLE MATERIAL】 These joggers pants made of Cotton -polyester,Soft fabric, comfortable tailored fit. If you like to be looser, please choose next size.
【TWO DEEP ZIPPER POCKETS】 Two side pockets are deep enough for storage (phone,keys,or small items) prevent your belongings from falling out when you are doing exercise.
【ELASTIC WAISTBAND WITH DRAWSTRING】 With adjustable internal drawstring design on the jogging trousers, you can adjust the waist size to be tighten or loosen according to your own need which provide you comfortable feeling and prevent it loosing.
【VERSATILE WORKOUT PANTS】 Suitable for gym, leisure, home, outdoor, sports like running, workout, fitness, training, jogging, basketball, fishing, baseball, hiking, bodybuilding, dancing etc.
【EASY CARE】 Fade, shrink, and wrinkle resistant; Track pants are quick dry and machine washable.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.34 x 10.56 x 1.77 inches; 1.08 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09J82Y682

Machine Wash
[MATERIAL] – Super soft and fuzzy fleece lined material, this pullover tops will definitely keep you warm all day. Zipper sweatshirts for women lightweight warmth, breathable, cozy.
[FEATURES] – Athletic workout hoodies,women pullover sweatshirt,long sleeve with thumbhole ,1/2 zip up collar, solid color,cropped length,stand collar,fleece lined,kangaroo pockets,relaxed fit,crop top,with thumbholes.
[DESIGN] – Thumb hole hoodies can keep the sleeves from shifting or flapping in the wind, help keep your sleeves in place and hands warm, add a little more coverage in cold weather.An exaggerated fit that feels extra roomy.Not too short, not too long, just right around the waistband.
[OCCASION] – Suitable for running, playing ball, dancing, cycling, playing ball, hiking, walking, exercising, home, daily wear, travel, for fall and winter.
[LASLULU SERVICE] – We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort.Each of your orders is the greatest encouragement to our shop, We’re always working to create the best for our customers.

LASLULU Womens Long Sleeve Fleece Sherpa Lined Zip Up Hooded Outwear with Pocket

This Fleece Lined Sweatshirts is Made of High Quality & Skin Friendly Material, Definitely Comfortable & Warm. It’s suitable for Spring, Autumn and Winter.

The lightweight fuzzy fabric is cozy and textural.

Features:

  • Zipped turtleneck, cozy oversize fit
  • Pullover design with kangaroo pocket on the front
  • Ultra soft pile fleece keep you warm and fashionable
  • It is a must-have in your wardrobe, and also is a Perfect Gift For A Friends, Wife, Mother, Aunt, Grandmother, Girlfriend Or Family.

If you are taller I’d recommend sizing up.

Tip: Due to many customers’ feedback that the leather zipper interface is easy to break, we replaced the zipper puller with a stronger metal zipper puller. We hope this will reduce customers’ worries about zipper pullers.

The fleece hooded cardigan is great for daily casual, work office, fall, winter holidays, going out, school, gym,vacation, party,it can also be a sweet Christmas Gift,New Year, Valentine’s Day to your love, friends or yourself.

Keywords:crop tops for women_athletic hoodies sweatshirts for women_workout tops_women long sleeve tops_winter coats for women_fleece lined leggings women_fleece jacket women_black zip up hoodie women_fall jackets for women_sherpa jacket women_women sweaters for fall_womens flannel jacket_cute hoodies_pullover sweaters for women_zipper hoodies for women_winter sweaters for women_oversized zip up hoodie_womens thermal tops_fuzzy jackets for women

Thumb Hole Design

Thumb hole hoodies can keep the sleeves from shifting or flapping in the wind, help keep your sleeves in place and hands warm, add a little more coverage in cold weather.

  • Wash with like colours
  • Machine wash cold
  • Do not bleach
  • Tumble dry low
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean

LASLULU Womens Pullover Fleece Hoodie

Designed for women’s sports wear in autumn and winter.

  • Pair them with jeans, athletic pants,joggers,wide-leg pants, and tights, or pair them with an overcoat, jacket, or leather coat for a casual sport look.
  • In daily exercise, it is very easy to catch a cold after exercise. Wearing it will give you warmth. Plus the unique design of the clothes makes you more attractive.
  • Style: Casual / Sports / Athletic
  • Size Type: Regular Size
  • Season: Autumn/Winter
  • Closure: 1/2 Zipper
  • Gender: Women

Read more

I own 2 and will buy more. Incredibly comfortable, go with everything, and make you feel a bit more put together than tossing on a sweatshirt normally would. I get tons of compliments on it.

I love this hoodie! This was my second color to purchase. They are so comfortable and perfect for both athletic and casual wear.

Love the half so hoodie. So comfy and warm for my trips to the gym or out walking. All the pockets are also a big plus.
